title: OYO to add 500 hotels in host cities of upcoming cricket world cup
description: Hospitality technology platform OYO on Friday said it will add 500 new hotels in the next three months in host cities of the upcoming men's cricket world cup in India, to meet the anticipated increase in booking demand.
